tool_description: Provides accurate travel time estimates for routes considering real-time traffic, historical patterns, and departure times.

route_geometry.description: Array of coordinate points defining the route path

departure_time.description: Planned departure time for traffic-aware estimation

travel_mode.description: Mode of transportation: driving, transit, walking, or cycling

traffic_model.description: Traffic model: optimistic, realistic, or pessimistic

include_breaks.description: Include recommended rest breaks in time estimation

error_messages: Invalid route geometry: Route must contain at least 2 coordinate points.
Invalid departure time: Use ISO 8601 date-time format.
Invalid travel mode: Use driving, transit, walking, or cycling.
Invalid traffic model: Use optimistic, realistic, or pessimistic.
Route too complex: Maximum 1000 coordinate points supported.
Historical data unavailable: Traffic historical data not available for estimation period.
usage: Provide route geometry with optional departure time and travel parameters. Returns comprehensive time estimates with confidence intervals.

estimated_duration.description: Primary travel time estimate in minutes

duration_range.description: Time estimate range as 'min_time - max_time minutes'

confidence_level.description: Confidence level of the estimate as percentage

traffic_impact.description: Description of traffic impact on travel time
